# ============================================================================
# GENERATED BY PARA, PopcornSAR
# Copyright(c) 2024 by PopcornSAR Co.,Ltd. All rights reserved.
# ============================================================================
 
add_executable(${PARA_APP_NAME})
 
# ============================================================================
# This setting is required for binary targets.
# Please modify the section below to suit your configuration.
# ============================================================================
Para_Target(${PARA_APP_NAME}
            PARA_LIBS_PRIVATE core log exec com
            PARA_GEN_DIR ${PARA_APP_GEN_DIR}
            OUTPUT_NAME ${PARA_APP_NAME}
)
# ============================================================================
# OpenCV Configuration
# ============================================================================
find_package(OpenCV REQUIRED)
include_directories(${OpenCV_INCLUDE_DIRS})
# ============================================================================
target_include_directories(${PARA_APP_NAME}
                            PRIVATE
                            ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/include
                            /opt/intel/openvino_2021/inference_engine/include
) 
# ============================================================================
link_directories(/opt/intel/openvino_2021/inference_engine/lib/intel64)
# ============================================================================
target_link_libraries(${PARA_APP_NAME}
                            PRIVATE
                            pthread
                            dl
                            inference_engine
                            inference_engine_legacy
                            inference_engine_transformations
                            ${OpenCV_LIBS}
)
# ============================================================================
target_sources(${PARA_APP_NAME}
               PRIVATE
               inference/aa/port/pportinference.cpp
               inference/aa/port/rportsensorfusion.cpp
               inference/aa/inference.cpp
               main.cpp
)
# ============================================================================
set(MODEL_PATH "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/model/model.xml")
add_definitions(-DMODEL_PATH=\"${MODEL_PATH}\")
